channel.title: [317] adding new maps
channel.description: anyone know how to add new maps to a client? so far i know you use tom's cache editor to edit the ~~~cache.idx4, i have another client that is 317 aswell but with some areas having new interfaces of a higher version, i just dont know what exactly to dump from the other client to insert into mine. both are [pi] clients.
